summary: Make your bears sound like the Tourette\'s Guy! **INSPIRED BY Andokool12**
descriptionHtml:
This mod contains replacement sounds for two attacks, two aggro sounds, and multiple injure/death sounds for all bears.

!! INSTALLATION !!

Extract the \"sound\" folder into Skyrim\'s \"Data\" folder.

All sounds Copyright Â© 2010 The Tourettes Guy.

~~I really have to thank Andokool12 for the awesome Swearing Mudcrabs mod that inspired this. Go download that mod!~~
author: Mritter26
